trans-unit.source: Represents a text decoration, which a visual ornamentation that is added to text (such as an underline).
trans-unit.target: 表示一个文本修饰，这将添加到 （如下划线） 的文本的视觉装饰。

trans-unit.source: There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline.
trans-unit.target: 文本修饰的四种类型︰ 下划线、 基线、 删除线和上划线。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示相对于文本的文本修饰的位置。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") Example of text decoration types The following example shows a text decoration that has been styled with a linear gradient brush and a dashed pen.
trans-unit.target: ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")的文本修饰类型示例下面的示例演示用线性渐变画笔和虚线的钢笔设计的文本修饰。

trans-unit.source: ![Text decoration with linear gradient underline](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "Text decoration with linear gradient underline") Example of an underline styled with a linear gradient brush and dashed pen Notice that TextDecoration is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable>.
trans-unit.target: ![采用线性渐变下划线的文本效果](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "采用线性渐变下划线的文本效果")的下划线的示例样式与线性渐变画笔和虚线的钢笔请注意该 TextDecoration 派生自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to apply animated effects to the decoration elements, using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation> for the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimation> for the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Pen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这样便能将动画的效果应用于修饰元素，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation><xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimation><xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Pen%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Pen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ThicknessAnimation> </xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationLocation>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值的<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location%2A>属性是<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationLocation>.</xref:System.Windows.TextDecorationLocation> </xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*>, <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Pen*>, <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*>, <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffsetUnit*>, and <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenThicknessUnit*> values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>使用指定的类<> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>，和<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenThicknessUnit*>值。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenThicknessUnit*>

trans-unit.source: The location of the text decoration.
trans-unit.target: 文本修饰的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> used to draw the text decoration.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>用于绘制文本修饰。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the text decoration color matches the text color to which it is applied, and the text decoration's thickness is set to the font's recommended thickness.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，文本修饰颜色匹配它应用的文本颜色以及文本修饰的粗细将设置为字体的推荐粗细。

trans-unit.source: The vertical displacement from the text decoration's location.
trans-unit.target: 文本修饰位置垂直偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A negative value moves the decoration lower, while a positive value moves the decoration higher.
trans-unit.target: 负数值向下移动修饰，是正数值移动修饰更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The units used to interpret the value of `penOffset`.
trans-unit.target: 用于解释的值的单位`penOffset`。

trans-unit.source: The units used to interpret the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*> for the `pen`.
trans-unit.target: 用于解释的值的单位<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>为`pen`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecoration"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical location at which the text decoration is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其中绘制文本修饰的垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the locations of the text decorations relative to the text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示相对于文本的文本修饰的位置。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagram of text decoration locations](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "Diagram of text decoration locations") Example of text decoration types The <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset%2A> property enables you to offset the text decoration from the specified Location.
trans-unit.target: ![文本修饰位置示意图](~/add/media/textdecoration01.gif "文本修饰位置示意图")的文本修饰类型示例<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset%2A>属性使您能够偏移量从指定位置的文本修饰。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The vertical location at which the text decoration is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 从该处绘制文本修饰的垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> used to draw the text decoration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>用于绘制文本修饰。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a text decoration that has been styled with a linear gradient brush and a dashed pen.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示用线性渐变画笔和虚线的钢笔设计的文本修饰。

trans-unit.source: ![Text decoration with linear gradient underline](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "Text decoration with linear gradient underline") Example of an underline styled with a linear gradient brush and dashed pen ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![采用线性渐变下划线的文本效果](~/add/media/textdecoration02.png "采用线性渐变下划线的文本效果")示例中的下划线的风格使用线性渐变画笔和虚线的钢笔 # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> used to draw the text decoration.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>用于绘制文本修饰。

trans-unit.source: If this value is `null`, the decoration color matches the text to which it is applied and the decoration's thickness is set to the font's recommended thickness.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为`null`，修饰颜色匹配的文本应用到的以及修饰的粗细将设置为字体的推荐粗细。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text decoration's offset from its <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本修饰的偏移量相对于其<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*>.</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*>

trans-unit.source: A negative value moves the text decoration higher, while a positive value moves the text decoration lower.
trans-unit.target: 负值则表示更高版本，在文本效果本移动时正值表示移动较低的文本修饰。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffsetUnit%2A> property to specify how the units of this value are interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffsetUnit%2A>属性来指定如何解释此值的单位。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffsetUnit%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The text decoration's offset from its <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*>.
trans-unit.target: 文本修饰的相对于其<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*>.</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Location*>偏移量

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the units in which the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*> value is expressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取在其中单位<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*>值表示。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The units in which the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*> value is expressed.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的单位<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*>值表示。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffset*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationUnit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffsetUnit*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffsetUnit*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenOffsetUnit*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Pen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Pen*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Pen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the units in which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*> of the text decoration's <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Pen*> is expressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取在其中单位<> *1> 文本修饰的<> *1> 表示。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The units in which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.Thickness*> of the text decoration's <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.Pen*> is expressed.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的单位<> *1> 文本修饰的<> *1> 表示。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationUnit"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.TextDecorationUnit"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenThicknessUnit*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenThicknessUnit*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.TextDecoration.PenThicknessUnit*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
